==========
Get Advice
==========


Introduction
============

This is a fancy `Hello World` to publishing Python library to PyPi.



Usage
=====

.. code-block:: python

   import getadvice as gadv
   gadv.advice(<insert_name>)



Description
===========

1. Input to advice() is a text string
2. Retrieve advice via REST-API

==========
